Shop The Collection
What moves us is to make the best jeans we can, not the most jeans we can. Use the best denim on the planet and for the planet.
Women
View All
Men
View All
Do One Thing Well
We make jeans. Nothing else. No distractions. No bobble caps. No perfumes. We focus on doing one thing well.
Our Factory
Back in 2002 the old jeans factory closed. That left 400 world class makers with nothing to make. Our job is to get their jobs back.
Read the story
Yearbook 6
Yearbook 6 is a chance to gather you, our community, and ask you for ideas, insights & different thinking.
Shop now
Rivet Press Blog
Nov 30, 2021
What Is Selvedge Denim?
What is Selvedge Denim?
Selvedge denim is a premium denim. It is woven on old shuttle looms. This is how the original denim was made.It is named after the finished edge of the ...
Nov 19, 2021
The Do One Thing Well Podcast - Sage.
The Do One Thing Well podcast is a monthly research project into brands and business that ‘Do One Thing Well’.
We pick businesses, products, and individuals who got us to utter ...

window.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
  
    var filter_arraycolorSidebarDrawer = [];
  
  
  var filter_arraysizeSidebarDrawer = [];
  

 $('.main-filter-color-SidebarDrawer .metafield-tag').click(function(e){
    if($(this).parent().hasClass('tag--active')){
      console.log('exist')
    $(this).parent().removeClass('tag--active');
      
  }
  else{
    $(this).parent().addClass('tag--active');
  }
  $('.selected-filter-color').text('');
  var found = jQuery.inArray($(this).attr('data-target'), filter_arraycolorSidebarDrawer);
  if (found >= 0) {
    // Element was found, remove it.
    filter_arraycolorSidebarDrawer.splice(found, 1);
  } else {
    // Element was not found, add it.
    filter_arraycolorSidebarDrawer.push($(this).attr('data-target'));
  }
  if(filter_arraycolorSidebarDrawer.length > 0){
    if(filter_arraycolorSidebarDrawer.length > 1){
      var colorarray = filter_arraycolorSidebarDrawer;
      var selected_color_string = colorarray.join().replace(/color_/g,'').replace(/,/g,', ').replace(/-/g,' ')
    	$('.selected-filter-color').text('Selected colours: '+selected_color_string)
    }
    else{
      $('.selected-filter-color').text('Selected colour: '+filter_arraycolorSidebarDrawer[0].replace(/color_/g,'').replace(/-/g,' '))
    }
    var last_selected = filter_arraycolorSidebarDrawer[filter_arraycolorSidebarDrawer.length-1];
    console.log(last_selected)
    $('.pick-image-'+last_selected).trigger('mouseenter');
    $('.filter-product-grids .color-swatch').addClass('hide');
    $('.filter-product-grids').each(function(){
      var trigger_image = $(this).find('.pick-image-'+last_selected).attr('data-variant-image');
      $(this).find('.image-'+last_selected).css('background-image','url('+trigger_image+')'); 
    })
    for(var i=0;i<filter_arraycolorSidebarDrawer.length;i++){
      $('.swatch-'+filter_arraycolorSidebarDrawer[i]).removeClass('hide');
    }
  }
  else{
	$('.filter-product-grids .color-swatch').removeClass('hide')
  }
  })
  
  $('.main-filter-size-SidebarDrawer').each(function(){
    $(this).find('li').sort(sort_li)
    .appendTo($(this));
  })
  function sort_li(a, b){
    return ($(b).data('position')) < ($(a).data('position')) ? 1 : -1;    
  }
  $('.main-filter-size-SidebarDrawer .metafield-tag').click(function(){
    if($(this).parent().hasClass('tag--active')){
      $(this).parent().removeClass('tag--active');
    }
    else{
      $(this).parent().addClass('tag--active');
    }
    var found = jQuery.inArray($(this).attr('data-target'), filter_arraysizeSidebarDrawer);
    if (found >= 0) {
      // Element was found, remove it.
      filter_arraysizeSidebarDrawer.splice(found, 1);
    } else {
      // Element was not found, add it.
      filter_arraysizeSidebarDrawer.push($(this).attr('data-target'));
    }
  })
  
  $('.metafield-tag.tag-inner-SidebarDrawer').click(function(){
    var filled_array = [];
    var parts = [filter_arraycolorSidebarDrawer,filter_arraysizeSidebarDrawer,];
    for(var i=0;i<parts.length;i++){
    if(parts[i].length != 0){
      filled_array.push(parts[i])
    }
  }
  try{
  var  result = filled_array.reduce((a, b) => a.reduce((r, v) => r.concat(b.map(w => [].concat(v, w))), []));
  }
  catch(err){var  result = ''}
  var selector = '';
  if(result.length == 0){
    // first category selection only.
    $('.tag-SidebarDrawer.tag--active').each(function(i){
      if(i !== $('.tag-SidebarDrawer.tag--active').length-1)
      selector +='.'+$(this).find('.metafield-tag').attr('data-target')+',';
    else
      selector +='.'+$(this).find('.metafield-tag').attr('data-target');
  })
  }
  else{
    for(var i=0;i<result.length;i++){
      if (i != result.length-1 )
        selector += '.'+result[i].toString().replace(/,/g, '.')+',';
      else
        selector += '.'+result[i].toString().replace(/,/g, '.')
        }
  }
  $('.no-product-found').hide();
  if(selector != ''){
    $('.filter-product-grids').hide();
    $(selector).show();
    $('.collection-filters__cta-area').css('display','flex');
    if($('.filter-product-grids:visible').length == 0){
      $('.no-product-found').show();
    }
  }
  else{
    $('.collection-filters__cta-area').hide();
    $('.filter-product-grids').show();
  }
  console.log(selector)
  $("html, body").animate({ scrollTop: $('#CollectionSection').offset().top-100 }, 300);
  AOS.refresh();
  
  
  
  	theme.FilterDrawer.close();
  
  })
  $('.collection-filters__cta-area').click(function(){
    $('.tag--active').each(function(){
      $(this).find('a').click();
    })
  })
  })
Clear filters

window.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
  
    var filter_arraycolorCollectionSidebar = [];
  
  
  var filter_arraysizeCollectionSidebar = [];
  

 $('.main-filter-color-CollectionSidebar .metafield-tag').click(function(e){
    if($(this).parent().hasClass('tag--active')){
      console.log('exist')
    $(this).parent().removeClass('tag--active');
      
  }
  else{
    $(this).parent().addClass('tag--active');
  }
  $('.selected-filter-color').text('');
  var found = jQuery.inArray($(this).attr('data-target'), filter_arraycolorCollectionSidebar);
  if (found >= 0) {
    // Element was found, remove it.
    filter_arraycolorCollectionSidebar.splice(found, 1);
  } else {
    // Element was not found, add it.
    filter_arraycolorCollectionSidebar.push($(this).attr('data-target'));
  }
  if(filter_arraycolorCollectionSidebar.length > 0){
    if(filter_arraycolorCollectionSidebar.length > 1){
      var colorarray = filter_arraycolorCollectionSidebar;
      var selected_color_string = colorarray.join().replace(/color_/g,'').replace(/,/g,', ').replace(/-/g,' ')
    	$('.selected-filter-color').text('Selected colours: '+selected_color_string)
    }
    else{
      $('.selected-filter-color').text('Selected colour: '+filter_arraycolorCollectionSidebar[0].replace(/color_/g,'').replace(/-/g,' '))
    }
    var last_selected = filter_arraycolorCollectionSidebar[filter_arraycolorCollectionSidebar.length-1];
    console.log(last_selected)
    $('.pick-image-'+last_selected).trigger('mouseenter');
    $('.filter-product-grids .color-swatch').addClass('hide');
    $('.filter-product-grids').each(function(){
      var trigger_image = $(this).find('.pick-image-'+last_selected).attr('data-variant-image');
      $(this).find('.image-'+last_selected).css('background-image','url('+trigger_image+')'); 
    })
    for(var i=0;i<filter_arraycolorCollectionSidebar.length;i++){
      $('.swatch-'+filter_arraycolorCollectionSidebar[i]).removeClass('hide');
    }
  }
  else{
	$('.filter-product-grids .color-swatch').removeClass('hide')
  }
  })
  
  $('.main-filter-size-CollectionSidebar').each(function(){
    $(this).find('li').sort(sort_li)
    .appendTo($(this));
  })
  function sort_li(a, b){
    return ($(b).data('position')) < ($(a).data('position')) ? 1 : -1;    
  }
  $('.main-filter-size-CollectionSidebar .metafield-tag').click(function(){
    if($(this).parent().hasClass('tag--active')){
      $(this).parent().removeClass('tag--active');
    }
    else{
      $(this).parent().addClass('tag--active');
    }
    var found = jQuery.inArray($(this).attr('data-target'), filter_arraysizeCollectionSidebar);
    if (found >= 0) {
      // Element was found, remove it.
      filter_arraysizeCollectionSidebar.splice(found, 1);
    } else {
      // Element was not found, add it.
      filter_arraysizeCollectionSidebar.push($(this).attr('data-target'));
    }
  })
  
  $('.metafield-tag.tag-inner-CollectionSidebar').click(function(){
    var filled_array = [];
    var parts = [filter_arraycolorCollectionSidebar,filter_arraysizeCollectionSidebar,];
    for(var i=0;i<parts.length;i++){
    if(parts[i].length != 0){
      filled_array.push(parts[i])
    }
  }
  try{
  var  result = filled_array.reduce((a, b) => a.reduce((r, v) => r.concat(b.map(w => [].concat(v, w))), []));
  }
  catch(err){var  result = ''}
  var selector = '';
  if(result.length == 0){
    // first category selection only.
    $('.tag-CollectionSidebar.tag--active').each(function(i){
      if(i !== $('.tag-CollectionSidebar.tag--active').length-1)
      selector +='.'+$(this).find('.metafield-tag').attr('data-target')+',';
    else
      selector +='.'+$(this).find('.metafield-tag').attr('data-target');
  })
  }
  else{
    for(var i=0;i<result.length;i++){
      if (i != result.length-1 )
        selector += '.'+result[i].toString().replace(/,/g, '.')+',';
      else
        selector += '.'+result[i].toString().replace(/,/g, '.')
        }
  }
  $('.no-product-found').hide();
  if(selector != ''){
    $('.filter-product-grids').hide();
    $(selector).show();
    $('.collection-filters__cta-area').css('display','flex');
    if($('.filter-product-grids:visible').length == 0){
      $('.no-product-found').show();
    }
  }
  else{
    $('.collection-filters__cta-area').hide();
    $('.filter-product-grids').show();
  }
  console.log(selector)
  $("html, body").animate({ scrollTop: $('#CollectionSection').offset().top-100 }, 300);
  AOS.refresh();
  
  
  })
  $('.collection-filters__cta-area').click(function(){
    $('.tag--active').each(function(){
      $(this).find('a').click();
    })
  })
  })
@media screen and (min-width: 769px) {
      .collection-filter__item--drawer {
        display: none;
      }
      .collection-filter__item--count {
        text-align: left;
      }
      html[dir="rtl"] .collection-filter__item--count {
        text-align: right;
      }
    }
.collection-filter__sort-container {
      display: none;
    }

window.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
  
    var filter_arraycolorSidebarDrawer = [];
  
  
  var filter_arraysizeSidebarDrawer = [];
  

 $('.main-filter-color-SidebarDrawer .metafield-tag').click(function(e){
    if($(this).parent().hasClass('tag--active')){
      console.log('exist')
    $(this).parent().removeClass('tag--active');
      
  }
  else{
    $(this).parent().addClass('tag--active');
  }
  $('.selected-filter-color').text('');
  var found = jQuery.inArray($(this).attr('data-target'), filter_arraycolorSidebarDrawer);
  if (found >= 0) {
    // Element was found, remove it.
    filter_arraycolorSidebarDrawer.splice(found, 1);
  } else {
    // Element was not found, add it.
    filter_arraycolorSidebarDrawer.push($(this).attr('data-target'));
  }
  if(filter_arraycolorSidebarDrawer.length > 0){
    if(filter_arraycolorSidebarDrawer.length > 1){
      var colorarray = filter_arraycolorSidebarDrawer;
      var selected_color_string = colorarray.join().replace(/color_/g,'').replace(/,/g,', ').replace(/-/g,' ')
    	$('.selected-filter-color').text('Selected colours: '+selected_color_string)
    }
    else{
      $('.selected-filter-color').text('Selected colour: '+filter_arraycolorSidebarDrawer[0].replace(/color_/g,'').replace(/-/g,' '))
    }
    var last_selected = filter_arraycolorSidebarDrawer[filter_arraycolorSidebarDrawer.length-1];
    console.log(last_selected)
    $('.pick-image-'+last_selected).trigger('mouseenter');
    $('.filter-product-grids .color-swatch').addClass('hide');
    $('.filter-product-grids').each(function(){
      var trigger_image = $(this).find('.pick-image-'+last_selected).attr('data-variant-image');
      $(this).find('.image-'+last_selected).css('background-image','url('+trigger_image+')'); 
    })
    for(var i=0;i<filter_arraycolorSidebarDrawer.length;i++){
      $('.swatch-'+filter_arraycolorSidebarDrawer[i]).removeClass('hide');
    }
  }
  else{
	$('.filter-product-grids .color-swatch').removeClass('hide')
  }
  })
  
  $('.main-filter-size-SidebarDrawer').each(function(){
    $(this).find('li').sort(sort_li)
    .appendTo($(this));
  })
  function sort_li(a, b){
    return ($(b).data('position')) < ($(a).data('position')) ? 1 : -1;    
  }
  $('.main-filter-size-SidebarDrawer .metafield-tag').click(function(){
    if($(this).parent().hasClass('tag--active')){
      $(this).parent().removeClass('tag--active');
    }
    else{
      $(this).parent().addClass('tag--active');
    }
    var found = jQuery.inArray($(this).attr('data-target'), filter_arraysizeSidebarDrawer);
    if (found >= 0) {
      // Element was found, remove it.
      filter_arraysizeSidebarDrawer.splice(found, 1);
    } else {
      // Element was not found, add it.
      filter_arraysizeSidebarDrawer.push($(this).attr('data-target'));
    }
  })
  
  $('.metafield-tag.tag-inner-SidebarDrawer').click(function(){
    var filled_array = [];
    var parts = [filter_arraycolorSidebarDrawer,filter_arraysizeSidebarDrawer,];
    for(var i=0;i<parts.length;i++){
    if(parts[i].length != 0){
      filled_array.push(parts[i])
    }
  }
  try{
  var  result = filled_array.reduce((a, b) => a.reduce((r, v) => r.concat(b.map(w => [].concat(v, w))), []));
  }
  catch(err){var  result = ''}
  var selector = '';
  if(result.length == 0){
    // first category selection only.
    $('.tag-SidebarDrawer.tag--active').each(function(i){
      if(i !== $('.tag-SidebarDrawer.tag--active').length-1)
      selector +='.'+$(this).find('.metafield-tag').attr('data-target')+',';
    else
      selector +='.'+$(this).find('.metafield-tag').attr('data-target');
  })
  }
  else{
    for(var i=0;i<result.length;i++){
      if (i != result.length-1 )
        selector += '.'+result[i].toString().replace(/,/g, '.')+',';
      else
        selector += '.'+result[i].toString().replace(/,/g, '.')
        }
  }
  $('.no-product-found').hide();
  if(selector != ''){
    $('.filter-product-grids').hide();
    $(selector).show();
    $('.collection-filters__cta-area').css('display','flex');
    if($('.filter-product-grids:visible').length == 0){
      $('.no-product-found').show();
    }
  }
  else{
    $('.collection-filters__cta-area').hide();
    $('.filter-product-grids').show();
  }
  console.log(selector)
  $("html, body").animate({ scrollTop: $('#CollectionSection').offset().top-100 }, 300);
  AOS.refresh();
  
  
  
  	theme.FilterDrawer.close();
  
  })
  $('.collection-filters__cta-area').click(function(){
    $('.tag--active').each(function(){
      $(this).find('a').click();
    })
  })
  })
Clear filters

window.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
  
    var filter_arraycolorCollectionSidebar = [];
  
  
  var filter_arraysizeCollectionSidebar = [];
  

 $('.main-filter-color-CollectionSidebar .metafield-tag').click(function(e){
    if($(this).parent().hasClass('tag--active')){
      console.log('exist')
    $(this).parent().removeClass('tag--active');
      
  }
  else{
    $(this).parent().addClass('tag--active');
  }
  $('.selected-filter-color').text('');
  var found = jQuery.inArray($(this).attr('data-target'), filter_arraycolorCollectionSidebar);
  if (found >= 0) {
    // Element was found, remove it.
    filter_arraycolorCollectionSidebar.splice(found, 1);
  } else {
    // Element was not found, add it.
    filter_arraycolorCollectionSidebar.push($(this).attr('data-target'));
  }
  if(filter_arraycolorCollectionSidebar.length > 0){
    if(filter_arraycolorCollectionSidebar.length > 1){
      var colorarray = filter_arraycolorCollectionSidebar;
      var selected_color_string = colorarray.join().replace(/color_/g,'').replace(/,/g,', ').replace(/-/g,' ')
    	$('.selected-filter-color').text('Selected colours: '+selected_color_string)
    }
    else{
      $('.selected-filter-color').text('Selected colour: '+filter_arraycolorCollectionSidebar[0].replace(/color_/g,'').replace(/-/g,' '))
    }
    var last_selected = filter_arraycolorCollectionSidebar[filter_arraycolorCollectionSidebar.length-1];
    console.log(last_selected)
    $('.pick-image-'+last_selected).trigger('mouseenter');
    $('.filter-product-grids .color-swatch').addClass('hide');
    $('.filter-product-grids').each(function(){
      var trigger_image = $(this).find('.pick-image-'+last_selected).attr('data-variant-image');
      $(this).find('.image-'+last_selected).css('background-image','url('+trigger_image+')'); 
    })
    for(var i=0;i<filter_arraycolorCollectionSidebar.length;i++){
      $('.swatch-'+filter_arraycolorCollectionSidebar[i]).removeClass('hide');
    }
  }
  else{
	$('.filter-product-grids .color-swatch').removeClass('hide')
  }
  })
  
  $('.main-filter-size-CollectionSidebar').each(function(){
    $(this).find('li').sort(sort_li)
    .appendTo($(this));
  })
  function sort_li(a, b){
    return ($(b).data('position')) < ($(a).data('position')) ? 1 : -1;    
  }
  $('.main-filter-size-CollectionSidebar .metafield-tag').click(function(){
    if($(this).parent().hasClass('tag--active')){
      $(this).parent().removeClass('tag--active');
    }
    else{
      $(this).parent().addClass('tag--active');
    }
    var found = jQuery.inArray($(this).attr('data-target'), filter_arraysizeCollectionSidebar);
    if (found >= 0) {
      // Element was found, remove it.
      filter_arraysizeCollectionSidebar.splice(found, 1);
    } else {
      // Element was not found, add it.
      filter_arraysizeCollectionSidebar.push($(this).attr('data-target'));
    }
  })
  
  $('.metafield-tag.tag-inner-CollectionSidebar').click(function(){
    var filled_array = [];
    var parts = [filter_arraycolorCollectionSidebar,filter_arraysizeCollectionSidebar,];
    for(var i=0;i<parts.length;i++){
    if(parts[i].length != 0){
      filled_array.push(parts[i])
    }
  }
  try{
  var  result = filled_array.reduce((a, b) => a.reduce((r, v) => r.concat(b.map(w => [].concat(v, w))), []));
  }
  catch(err){var  result = ''}
  var selector = '';
  if(result.length == 0){
    // first category selection only.
    $('.tag-CollectionSidebar.tag--active').each(function(i){
      if(i !== $('.tag-CollectionSidebar.tag--active').length-1)
      selector +='.'+$(this).find('.metafield-tag').attr('data-target')+',';
    else
      selector +='.'+$(this).find('.metafield-tag').attr('data-target');
  })
  }
  else{
    for(var i=0;i<result.length;i++){
      if (i != result.length-1 )
        selector += '.'+result[i].toString().replace(/,/g, '.')+',';
      else
        selector += '.'+result[i].toString().replace(/,/g, '.')
        }
  }
  $('.no-product-found').hide();
  if(selector != ''){
    $('.filter-product-grids').hide();
    $(selector).show();
    $('.collection-filters__cta-area').css('display','flex');
    if($('.filter-product-grids:visible').length == 0){
      $('.no-product-found').show();
    }
  }
  else{
    $('.collection-filters__cta-area').hide();
    $('.filter-product-grids').show();
  }
  console.log(selector)
  $("html, body").animate({ scrollTop: $('#CollectionSection').offset().top-100 }, 300);
  AOS.refresh();
  
  
  })
  $('.collection-filters__cta-area').click(function(){
    $('.tag--active').each(function(){
      $(this).find('a').click();
    })
  })
  })
@media screen and (min-width: 769px) {
      .collection-filter__item--drawer {
        display: none;
      }
      .collection-filter__item--count {
        text-align: left;
      }
      html[dir="rtl"] .collection-filter__item--count {
        text-align: right;
      }
    }
.collection-filter__sort-container {
      display: none;
    }

A Collection a Day
Regular price
$20.00 CAD
/
Ever since she was a young girl, artist and illustrator Lisa Congdon has been obsessed with collecting. Having amassed a curious collection of objects, on January 1, 2010, she embarked on a year-long
project
: a daily documentation of arrangements of these items, posted online. “Most of the collections are real and exist in my home or studio; those I will photograph. Some are imagined; those I will draw or (occasionally) paint.”
448 pages, 7.75" x 5.125" x 1.5"
Packaged in a full colour, embossed and hinged tin.
selected press
The New York Times
Martha Stewart Living
National Post
San Francisco Chronicle
See more here.
Close (esc)

Regular price
$50.00 CAD
/

Close (esc)
Art Supplies (Pre-Order)
Regular price
$65.00 CAD
/
Volume A: Art Supplies
UPPERCASE Encyclopedia of Inspiration
The 10th volume in the UPPERCASE Encyclopedia of Inspiration is all about Art Supplies: the provenance, lore and enduring appeal of art-making ingredients, materials and accessories told through profiles of artists, artisans and manufacturers (independent makers and venerable brands with historical legacies).
Lushly illustrated through photography and artwork, this exuberant edition will be a must-have volume in the UPPERCASE Encyclopedia of Inspiration.
The size and scope of this volume will be similar to Volume Y (496 pages). Volume A is scheduled to be released in May 2022.
The pre-order price includes free worldwide shipping.

Back Issue Bundle
Regular price
$136.00 CAD
/
This bundle ships from Canada only. Please select your destination to determine postage.
This bundle includes the following 12 back issues for $10 apiece plus shipping:
#50, #49, #47, #46, #45, #44, #43, #42, #38, #36, #34, #32.
Within Canada: $120 for the 12 issues plus $16 shipping = $136
To the USA: CAD$120 for the 12 issues plus $50 shipping = $170
Outside of N America: CAD$120 for the 12 issues plus $150 courier = $270
Any customs or import charges are at the discretion of the recipient's country and are entirely the responsibility of the purchaser.
Please refer to the back issue page to see images of each of the covers.

Feed Sacks (reprint)
Regular price
$42.00 CAD
/
OUT OF STOCK
Please order through Martingale.
Feed
Sacks
: The
Colourful
History
of a Frugal Fabric
(originally published in 2016, reprint by Martingale in October 2019)
544 pages
The interior content of the book is just the same as the 2016 edition but
this reprint does not have a dust jacket.
Feed
sacks
are the perfect example of a utilitarian product turned into something beautiful. Author Linzee Kull McCray explores the
history
of the humble
feed
sack
, from a plain burlap or cotton
sack
to exuberantly patterned and
colourful
bags
that were repurposed into frocks, aprons and quilts by thrifty housewives in the first half of the 20th century. Extensive imagery and at-scale reproductions of these fabrics create an inspiring sourcebook of pattern and colour—and offer a welcome visit to a slower-paced way of life.
Please note that this book ships from the USA. Any customs or import duties are the responsibility of the purchaser.
If you are in Canada and wish to order other books from UPPERCASE, please do so in a separate transaction so that your other items will be sent from Canada. Thanks!
Close (esc)
Gift Card
Regular price
$50.00 CAD
/
To give a friend, family member or colleague something from UPPERCASE, please purchase them a Gift Card so that they can redeem it for a subscription or other publications of their choosing.
• $80 for subscriptions going to North American addresses
• $120 for subscriptions going to overseas addresses
• Also available in denominations of $50 and $100 for general gifts.
HOW TO PURCHASE
1. Select the desired amount, shown in Canadian dollars. (Your payment method will do the currency conversion if you're outside of Canada.)
2. Select the desired quantity of 1.
2. Select your delivery method.
Select "
Add to Cart
" if you personally want to receive the Gift Card redemption code to your email address so that you can print them out or give it to your recipient. If you want to purchase multiple Gift Cards in one transaction and manually forward each of them to your recipients, please update the quantity above.
Select "
Send as a Gift
" to have your Gift Card emailed directly to your recipient. You can choose the card artwork, add a message and schedule the delivery of the digital card or print out the artwork instead. Please do one transaction per recipient.
3. Following payment, Gift Cards are delivered by email and contain checkout redemption instructions. Gift cards have no additional processing fees and do not expire.
Close (esc)
Gift Subscription: Starting with #52 (January 2021)
Regular price
$80.00 CAD
/
THIS IS A TEST LISTING FOR MY DEVELOPER. DO NOT ORDER HERE. Please purchase a Gift Card via the link in the top navigation bar.
Whenever the subscriber's name and contact details are different than the billing contact, please purchase a gift subscription. Enter the recipient's info in the shipping fields and your name and email in the billing fields.
NOTE: You can only purchase one subscription or gift subscription address per order. If you want to also purchase other items and/or a subscription to be sent to yourself, please do that in a separate transaction so that our database entry is correct. thanks.
#52 Jan/Feb/March 2022
#53 April/May/June 2022
#54 July/Aug/Sept 2022
#55 Oct/Nov/Dec 2022
When you select a two-year renewal option, you save automatically $30 off the price of two individual subscriptions!

Close (esc)
Close (esc)
Little U wholesale
Regular price
$168.00 CAD
Sale price
$150.00 CAD
/
Carton of 12 copies.
Recommended retail cover price $24.
Little U, the offspring of UPPERCASE magazine, is an occasional magazine/book for the young at heart. (Think of it as a smaller and cuter version of UPPERCASE!) With childlike wonder—but not a juvenile attitude—Little U explores making, designing, illustrating and living. Highlighting children's books, surface pattern design, clothing and product design for young folk, and arts and crafts inspired by and/or made for children, this publication inspires and informs professional creatives and families alike.
It’s not a magazine for children
,
rather it's about lots of different kinds of creativity
inspired by children and the children's industry.
You don’t have to be a parent to read and enjoy Little U—it’s not a parenting magazine focused on things to purchase or child-rearing advice. Simply loving cute and curious things is the only requirement!
Children should be children—no tarted-up photo shoots of children in makeup or expensive clothing. Little U prefers natural kids and photographs.
No unrealistic expectations—no crazy elaborate birthday party plans or unattainable perfection. We love getting into a mess and enjoy the creative process as much as the end result.
Little U is a small-format book (5 inches wide by 6 inches tall), but at 244 pages, it has a nice, thick spine and lots to read and look at.
No advertising!
10% of profits will be donated to UNICEF.
Close (esc)

Close (esc)

Close (esc)
Close (esc)
Little U: Volume 1 (2018)
Regular price
$24.00 CAD
/
Little U, the offspring of UPPERCASE magazine, is an occasional magazine/book for the young at heart. (Think of it as a smaller and cuter version of UPPERCASE!) Published in 2018.
With childlike wonder, Little U explores making, designing, illustrating and living. Highlighting children's books, surface pattern design, clothing and product design for young folk, and arts and crafts inspired by and/or made for children, this publication inspires and informs professional creatives and families alike.
Little U is a small-format book (5 inches wide by 6 inches tall), but at 244 pages, it has a nice, thick spine and lots to read and look at.
No advertising! 10% of profits will be donated to UNICEF.

A Collection a Day
Regular price
$20.00 CAD
/
Ever since she was a young girl, artist and illustrator Lisa Congdon has been obsessed with collecting. Having amassed a curious collection of objects, on January 1, 2010, she embarked on a year-long
project
: a daily documentation of arrangements of these items, posted online. “Most of the collections are real and exist in my home or studio; those I will photograph. Some are imagined; those I will draw or (occasionally) paint.”
448 pages, 7.75" x 5.125" x 1.5"
Packaged in a full colour, embossed and hinged tin.
selected press
The New York Times
Martha Stewart Living
National Post
San Francisco Chronicle
See more here.

Art Supplies (Pre-Order)
Regular price
$65.00 CAD
/
Volume A: Art Supplies
UPPERCASE Encyclopedia of Inspiration
The 10th volume in the UPPERCASE Encyclopedia of Inspiration is all about Art Supplies: the provenance, lore and enduring appeal of art-making ingredients, materials and accessories told through profiles of artists, artisans and manufacturers (independent makers and venerable brands with historical legacies).
Lushly illustrated through photography and artwork, this exuberant edition will be a must-have volume in the UPPERCASE Encyclopedia of Inspiration.
The size and scope of this volume will be similar to Volume Y (496 pages). Volume A is scheduled to be released in May 2022.
The pre-order price includes free worldwide shipping.

This bundle ships from Canada only. Please select your destination to determine postage.

To the USA: CAD$120 for the 12 issues plus $50 shipping = $170

Any customs or import charges are at the discretion of the recipient's country and are entirely the responsibility of the purchaser.
Please refer to the back issue page to see images of each of the covers.

Feed Sacks (reprint)
Regular price
$42.00 CAD
/
OUT OF STOCK
Please order through Martingale.
Feed
Sacks
: The
Colourful
History
of a Frugal Fabric
(originally published in 2016, reprint by Martingale in October 2019)
544 pages
The interior content of the book is just the same as the 2016 edition but
this reprint does not have a dust jacket.
Feed
sacks
are the perfect example of a utilitarian product turned into something beautiful. Author Linzee Kull McCray explores the
history
of the humble
feed
sack
, from a plain burlap or cotton
sack
to exuberantly patterned and
colourful
bags
that were repurposed into frocks, aprons and quilts by thrifty housewives in the first half of the 20th century. Extensive imagery and at-scale reproductions of these fabrics create an inspiring sourcebook of pattern and colour—and offer a welcome visit to a slower-paced way of life.
Please note that this book ships from the USA. Any customs or import duties are the responsibility of the purchaser.
If you are in Canada and wish to order other books from UPPERCASE, please do so in a separate transaction so that your other items will be sent from Canada. Thanks!
Close (esc)
Gift Card
Regular price
$50.00 CAD
/
To give a friend, family member or colleague something from UPPERCASE, please purchase them a Gift Card so that they can redeem it for a subscription or other publications of their choosing.
• $80 for subscriptions going to North American addresses
• $120 for subscriptions going to overseas addresses
• Also available in denominations of $50 and $100 for general gifts.
HOW TO PURCHASE
1. Select the desired amount, shown in Canadian dollars. (Your payment method will do the currency conversion if you're outside of Canada.)
2. Select the desired quantity of 1.
2. Select your delivery method.
Select "
Add to Cart
" if you personally want to receive the Gift Card redemption code to your email address so that you can print them out or give it to your recipient. If you want to purchase multiple Gift Cards in one transaction and manually forward each of them to your recipients, please update the quantity above.
Select "
Send as a Gift
" to have your Gift Card emailed directly to your recipient. You can choose the card artwork, add a message and schedule the delivery of the digital card or print out the artwork instead. Please do one transaction per recipient.
3. Following payment, Gift Cards are delivered by email and contain checkout redemption instructions. Gift cards have no additional processing fees and do not expire.
Close (esc)

THIS IS A TEST LISTING FOR MY DEVELOPER. DO NOT ORDER HERE. Please purchase a Gift Card via the link in the top navigation bar.
Whenever the subscriber's name and contact details are different than the billing contact, please purchase a gift subscription. Enter the recipient's info in the shipping fields and your name and email in the billing fields.
NOTE: You can only purchase one subscription or gift subscription address per order. If you want to also purchase other items and/or a subscription to be sent to yourself, please do that in a separate transaction so that our database entry is correct. thanks.

Little U wholesale
Regular price
$168.00 CAD
Sale price
$150.00 CAD
/
Carton of 12 copies.
Recommended retail cover price $24.
Little U, the offspring of UPPERCASE magazine, is an occasional magazine/book for the young at heart. (Think of it as a smaller and cuter version of UPPERCASE!) With childlike wonder—but not a juvenile attitude—Little U explores making, designing, illustrating and living. Highlighting children's books, surface pattern design, clothing and product design for young folk, and arts and crafts inspired by and/or made for children, this publication inspires and informs professional creatives and families alike.
It’s not a magazine for children
,
rather it's about lots of different kinds of creativity
inspired by children and the children's industry.
You don’t have to be a parent to read and enjoy Little U—it’s not a parenting magazine focused on things to purchase or child-rearing advice. Simply loving cute and curious things is the only requirement!
Children should be children—no tarted-up photo shoots of children in makeup or expensive clothing. Little U prefers natural kids and photographs.
No unrealistic expectations—no crazy elaborate birthday party plans or unattainable perfection. We love getting into a mess and enjoy the creative process as much as the end result.
Little U is a small-format book (5 inches wide by 6 inches tall), but at 244 pages, it has a nice, thick spine and lots to read and look at.
No advertising!
10% of profits will be donated to UNICEF.

Little U: Volume 1 (2018)
Regular price
$24.00 CAD
/
Little U, the offspring of UPPERCASE magazine, is an occasional magazine/book for the young at heart. (Think of it as a smaller and cuter version of UPPERCASE!) Published in 2018.
With childlike wonder, Little U explores making, designing, illustrating and living. Highlighting children's books, surface pattern design, clothing and product design for young folk, and arts and crafts inspired by and/or made for children, this publication inspires and informs professional creatives and families alike.
Little U is a small-format book (5 inches wide by 6 inches tall), but at 244 pages, it has a nice, thick spine and lots to read and look at.
No advertising! 10% of profits will be donated to UNICEF.

Reversing Climate Change Through Better Business
Reducing our environmental impact has been a top priority since day one. But now, we’re taking things further. Explore our overall sustainability approach, our progress thus far, and our bold list of commitments for 2025.
Our Sustainable Practices
Stories
A Technical Trail Shoe To Take Off-Road
Our first-ever running shoe designed for the trails is sustainably-engineered and intentionally designed for durability, comfort, and performance.
Giving Mother Nature a Seat at the Table
We are prioritizing the planet, not just profits. Introducing the next generation business.
Planet-Friendly Activewear
The Natural Run Collection is made with sustainable materials that can stand up to 
your toughest workout.
adidas and Allbirds
Learn more about FUTURECRAFT.FOOTPRINT, our collaborative shoe coming soon.
How much did your outfit cost the planet?
Now any brand can use our Carbon Footprint tools to label their emissions.
Plant Leather
A 100% Natural, Plant-Based Leather. Coming Soon.
Run Hard, Tread Light
Meet the Tree Dasher—a performance shoe made with natural materials.
Our Doors Are Open
The well-being of our retail communities is top priority as our stores re-open around the globe.
We're A Certified B Corp
From the very beginning, the environment has been a stakeholder here.

Join our email list and be the first to know about new limited edition products, material innovations, and lots of other fun updates.

By signing up you agree to receive marketing emails from Parkland Mfg. Ltd. containing news and promotions regarding our products and events. You can unsubscribe at any time. For more details see our Privacy Policy or contact us.

Hi, you really need javascript to navigate this site on mobile devices.
This deodorant changes lives!
Our giveback program both donates money to breast cancer research and free deodorant to programs supporting cancer warriors and survivors.
1% from every SmartyPits product sold
is donated directly to
City of Hope's
programs for breast cancer research and education.
As part of the
Feeling Beautiful Again Program
, SmartyPits has donated 10,000 sticks of free deodorant to breast cancer warriors and survivors.

Facebook
Twitter
YouTube

This deodorant changes lives!
Our giveback program both donates money to breast cancer research and free deodorant to programs supporting cancer warriors and survivors.
1% from every SmartyPits product sold
is donated directly to
City of Hope's
programs for breast cancer research and education.
As part of the
Feeling Beautiful Again Program
, SmartyPits has donated 10,000 sticks of free deodorant to breast cancer warriors and survivors.

Menstrual
Stay clean, fresh, and balanced, even during your period with our naturally-derived menstrual products. Have a more peaceful period with herbal-infused sanitary pads that create a “cooling” sensation. With our line of organic pads, tampons and menstrual cups, you never have to question what's going into your body. Whether you prefer to use menstrual cups, tampons or pads, we have the feminine care products you need.
Shop Menstrual

Soothe
Get the calm you need to make it through your day and night with products that help support vaginal wellness through formulas and products that soothe. The Honey Pot specializes in natural, plant-derived feminine wellness products that freshen, support, and balance while leaving you feeling healthy and clean. Shop below to find soothing balms, feminine suppositories, and more with refreshingly natural and minimalistic formulas.  The Honey Pot, made by humans with vaginas for humans with vaginas.
Shop Soothe
